item.title: CVE-2022-32175|2024-08-03T07:32:55.993Z -- adguardhome -- adguardhome
item.description: In AdGuardHome, versions v0.95 through v0.108.0-b.13 are vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF), in the custom filtering rules functionality. An attacker can persuade an authorized user to follow a malicious link, resulting in deleting/modifying the custom filtering rules.
